name: Distorted Travesty 3
description: Distorted Travesty 3: Saved Game is the final chapter in the Distorted Travesty trilogy with a return to the first game's focus on fast paced combat and platforming. You play as both Jerry and Claire, who now travel to the mainland after discovering that a virus has infected the program. After the virus removed all of Jerry and Claire's abilities, they must now search for the power to defeat the virus and prevent it from shutting the program down.
